parameters.name: AppId
parameters.description: The ID of the SAE application.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese.
*   **en**: English.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page.

parameters.name: ResourceDirectoryUid
parameters.description: The UID of the resource directory.
